ecosim

Class Execs

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecosim.Execs

  • public class Execs
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the executable methods for the cohan program.
    Author:
    Andrew Warner & Jason Wood

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Execs(MasterVariables masterVariables)
      Detects the Operating System that this class is running on, and executes the native fortran applications.

    • Method Summary

      Opens the tree using NJPlot so that the user can see it to start analysis.

    • Method Detail

      • runFred

        public int runFred()
        Runs the initial Fred method to find a good value with which to do hill climbing.
        Returns:
        The exit value, -1 if there was an error.

      • runBinning

        public int runBinning()
        Runs the binning process. Pre: sequencesfasta and numbers.dat are formatted correctly. Also the programs removegaps.exe, readsynec.exe, etc must all be in the root folder. Post: output.dat contains the binning data
        Returns:
        The exit value.

      • runHillClimb

        public int runHillClimb()
        Runs the hillclimb program.
        Returns:
        The exit value.

      • openTree

        public int openTree(java.lang.String treeFile)
        Opens the tree using NJPlot so that the user can see it to start analysis.
        Parameters:
        treeFile - The tree file to open in NJPlot.
        Returns:
        The exit value.
